roleset.name: send a text message via cell phone

example.name: args0 and 2
example.text: Make him email or text you .

example.name: with arg3
example.text: I texted him about the Van Halen concert this May.
example.arg: about the Van Halen concert this May

example.name: All args
example.text: The wine spoke to me so and I texted him about itâ€¦..that I was by no means inviting myself to his b-day, I was just wondering when it was.
example.arg: that I was by no means inviting myself to his b-day, I was just wondering when it was

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. Comparison to 'email'.
